basics.name: Michal Tešnar
basics.label: Student of Data Science
basics.summary: I have a passion for optimizing everything that can be optimized: from my daily routines to robot trajectories. I am the luckiest person, since I was born in an era when we do just that with AI. I love talking to people and learning languages: apart from my mother tongue (Czech) and the languages in which I studied (C1: English, Dutch), I also learned German and Spanish (B1), and now starting Russian (A1). I will be super happy if you talk to me in any of those!

courses: Planning & Decision Making for Autonomous Robots
Holistic degree combining computer science, machine learning, psychology, philosophy, and ethics of AI.
Extra courses in Mathematics: Linear Algebra, Calculus, Graph Theory, Analysis, Optimization.
Participated in ICPC Algorithmic Programming Contests on an international stage.
Extracurricular Honours Programme (45 ECTS): deepening research projects in robotics, broadening horizons by taking courses from different faculties.

work.name: Oracle Labs Switzerland
work.summary: I was working on applications of reasoning models in agentic framework used in internal products of Oracle.

work.name: ASML Netherlands
work.summary: I developed and tested factory automation and integration software, which prevents human errors, and thereby decreases iteration time of development.

work.name: University of Groningen
work.summary: I taught an extracurricular course Algorithmic Programming Contests which is focused on preparing a small class of students to become competitive programmers.

awards.title: Jong Talent Prijs
awards.summary: Award for best performance in first-year of bachelor's degree

awards.title: TKKF University Scholarship
awards.summary: Financial support for talented students abroad
